name: Solid Intel
description: Whenever an ally is critically hit, they gain 8% Turn Meter, Advantage and Critical Damage Up for 1 turn.

name: Voluntary Vanguard
description: At the start of battle, the strongest ally gains Marked. Allies take 30% reduced damage as long as the Marked ally is alive (This effect doesn't stack).

name: Ruthless: Swiftness
description: Whenever an enemy falls below 100% Health all allies gain 22% Turn Meter.

name: Certain Defeat
description: The first time an enemy would be reduced to 50% Health, they are inflicted with Healing Immunity and Protection Disruption for 2 turns, which can't be evaded or resisted.

name: Ruthless: Debilitation
description: When an enemy falls below 100% Health they are inflicted with Healing Immunity and 2 stacks of Armor Shred, which can't be dispelled or resisted.

name: Ruthless: Swiftness
description: Whenever an enemy falls below 100% Health all allies gain 27% Turn Meter.

name: Entrenched
description: At the start of encounter, all allies gain Protection Up (75%) until they are defeated, which can't be dispelled or prevented.

name: Critical Debuffs
description: Enemy units gain Critical Chance Down, Critical Damage Down and Offense Down for 2 turns at the start of their turn, which can't be resisted.

name: Amplify Agony
description: Whenever an ally inflicts a debuff on an enemy, they also deal 6.63% Max Health damage to that enemy. This damage can't defeat enemies.

name: Leader's Resolve
description: The allied unit in the Leader slot gains 66% Max Health, 53% Max Protection, 40% Offense and 20% Speed.

name: Ability Exhaust
description: Whenever an enemy gains 10 debuffs, they gain Ability Block for 1 turn, which can't be resisted or evaded.

name: Deadly Catalyst
description: All allies ignore 30% of the enemy's Protection and gain 30% Offense (stacking) until the end of the encounter each time an enemy falls below 100%, 70%, and 40% Health.

name: Amplify Agony
description: Whenever an ally inflicts a debuff on an enemy, they also deal 5.1% Max Health damage to that enemy. This damage can't defeat enemies.

name: Legendary Consumable Boost
description: Stat increases from Booster consumables are increased by 100%. Booster and Medpac consumables grant +25% Speed. This does not stack with other Legendary Consumable Boost data disks.

name: Convor's Agility
description: Allies gain 7% Evasion and 20% Turn Meter whenever they evade.

name: Power
description: Allied units gain 27% Offense and 22% Critical Damage.

name: Caustic Emissions
description: Enemy units gain two Damage over Time effects for 2 turns at the start of their turn, which can't be resisted.

name: Entrenched
description: At the start of encounter, all allies gain Protection Up (25%) until they are defeated, which can't be dispelled or prevented.

name: Spirited Speed
description: Whenever an ally gains a buff, they also gain 3.3% Turn Meter.

name: Stun Exhaust
description: At the end of round, whenever an enemy is inflicted with 20 debuffs, they are Stunned for 1 turn.

name: Vitality
description: Allied units gain 35% Max Health and 28% Max Protection.

name: Invasive Endings
description: The first time an ally is defeated, inflict all enemies with 5 stacks of Damage Over Time and Defense Down for 2 turns, which can't be evaded or resisted

name: Ability Fatigue
description: Whenever an enemy uses an ability, they are inflicted with a stack of Damage Over Time for 2 turns, which can't be evaded or resisted.

name: Power
description: Allied units gain 20% Offense and 17% Critical Damage.

name: War of Attrition
description: Once per turn, whenever a debuff expires on an enemy, all enemies lose 4% Turn Meter. (This disk doesn't stack)

name: Guard and Penetrate
description: At the start of battle allied units gain 210% Defense. Whenever an ally is damaged by an enemy, they lose 7% of this Defense and gain 7 Defense Penetration. Whenever an enemy is defeated, all allies gain 50% Defense. (This effect doesn't stack)

name: Thermal Exhaust
description: Whenever an enemy gains 5 debuffs, they gain 2 stacks of Thermal Detonator for 2 turns, which can't be resisted. (This effect doesn't stack.)

name: War of Attrition
description: Once per turn, whenever a debuff expires on an enemy, all enemies lose 4% Turn Meter. (This disk doesn't stack)
